summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. It confirms a scheduled visit to Epstein's residence on January 16, 2013, at 4:30 PM. The email highlights the professional relationship between the individuals involved and their connection to Epstein.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and Paul Morris.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank and is confirming his attendance to meet with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual with whom Paul Morris is scheduled to meet at his home.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is facilitating a meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is meeting with Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional relationship possibly related to financial services.

events.title: Meeting Confirmation
events.description: Lesley Groff confirms a meeting for Paul Morris with Jeffrey Epstein at Epstein's residence.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein.
Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank.
The meeting is scheduled for January 16, 2013, at 4:30 PM.
The meeting will take place at Epstein's residence on East 71st Street.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.
